org.fujion.plotly.layout

Class SliderOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.layout.SliderOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class SliderOptions
extends Options
    Layout options for sliders.

    • Field Detail

      • active

        @Option
public Integer active
        Determines which button (by index starting from 0) is considered active.

        Default: 0

      • activebgcolor

        @Option
public String activebgcolor
        The background color of the slider grip while dragging.

        Default: "#dbdde0"

      • bgcolor

        @Option
public String bgcolor
        The background color of the slider.

        Default: "#f8fafc"

      • bordercolor

        @Option
public String bordercolor
        The color of the border enclosing the slider.

        Default: "#bec8d9"

      • borderwidth

        @Option
public Integer borderwidth
        The width (in px) of the border enclosing the slider.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • currentvalue

        @Option
public final CurrentValueOptions currentvalue
        Options for displaying the current value.

      • font

        @Option
public final FontOptions font
        The font of the slider step labels.

      • len

        @Option
public Integer len
        The length of the slider This measure excludes the padding of both ends. That is, the slider's length is this length minus the padding on both ends.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • lenmode

        @Option
public MeasurementEnum lenmode
        Determines whether this slider length is set in units of plot fraction or in pixels. Use "len" to set the value.

        Default: FRACTION

      • minorticklen

        @Option
public Integer minorticklen
        The length in pixels of minor step tick marks.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 4

      • pad_b

        @Option(value="pad.b")
public Integer pad_b
        The amount of padding (in px) along the bottom of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_l

        @Option(value="pad.l")
public Integer pad_l
        The amount of padding (in px) along the left of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_r

        @Option(value="pad.r")
public Integer pad_r
        The amount of padding (in px) along the right of the component.

        Default: 0

      • pad_t

        @Option(value="pad.t")
public Integer pad_t
        The amount of padding (in px) along the top of the component.

        Default: 0

      • steps

        @Option
public final ControlOptions steps
        Options for step controls.

      • tickcolor

        @Option
public String tickcolor
        The color of the border enclosing the slider.

        Default: "#333"

      • ticklen

        @Option
public Integer ticklen
        The length in pixels of step tick marks the length in pixels of step tick marks.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 7

      • tickwidth

        @Option
public Integer tickwidth
        The tick width (in px).

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • transition_duration

        @Option(value="transition.duration")
public Integer transition_duration
        The duration of the slider transition.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 150

      • transition_easing

        @Option(value="transition.easing")
public SliderOptions.EasingEnum transition_easing
        The easing function of the slider transition.

      • visible

        @Option
public Boolean visible
        Determines whether or not the slider is visible.

        Default: true

      • x

        @Option
public Double x
        The x position (in normalized coordinates) of the slider.

        Constraints: ≥-2 and ≤3

        Default: 0

      • xanchor

        @Option
public HorizontalAlignEnum xanchor
        The slider's horizontal position anchor. This anchor binds the "x" position to the left, center or right of the range selector.

        Default: LEFT

      • y

        @Option
public Double y
        The y position (in normalized coordinates) of the slider.

        Constraints: ≥-2 and ≤3

        Default: 0

      • yanchor

        @Option
public VerticalAlignEnum yanchor
        The slider's vertical position anchor This anchor binds the "y" position to the top, middle or bottom of the range selector.

        Default: TOP
